title: Descriptors of a version of a data model curated at the Smart Data Models initiative
description: it stores the main data about a specific version of a data model curate at the smart datamodels initiative

id.description: Property. Unique Id of the entity

type.description: Property. It has to be DataModelVersion

subject.description: Property. Subject of the data model

version.description: Property. Version of the data model

date.description: Property. Date of the commit of the current data model

url.description: Property. URL to the github repository where the data model version is published

commit.description: Property. Hash of the commit of the data model version
